abstract: Undercover FBI agent testifies in trial of Tairod Pugh in Brooklyn federal court; Pugh is first American to go on trial on charges of supporting or trying to support Islamic State group.

headline.print_headline:
F.B.I. Agent Tells of Chat
With Suspect in ISIS Case
headline.main: F.B.I. Agent Testifies About Conversation With Suspect in ISIS Case

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: An undercover agent assigned to determine whether Tairod Pugh was trying to join the Islamic State spoke at Mr. Pugh’s trial in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: An undercover agent assigned to determine whether Tairod Pugh was trying to join the Islamic State spoke at Mr. Pugh’s trial in Brooklyn.
